short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Offline Games - Sudoku 2048 Linkup Flappy Bird Tetris Minesweeper in Chrome Side Panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play offline mini games on browser sidebar.

Supported games:
- Sudoku
- 2048
- Flappy bird
- Fruit link
- Tetris
- Line Square Dot
- Number slide puzzle

More mini game under developing.
